contents.title: Step Up: All In
contents.mediumSynopsis: After struggling for a year to make it big in Hollywood, Sean's (Ryan Guzman) dance crew gives up and moves back to Miami. Sean, not ready to relinquish his dream quite yet, remains in Los Angeles. When he hears about an upcoming dance competition in Las Vegas, Sean tea

contents.title: StreetDance
contents.mediumSynopsis: British teen dance drama, also released in 3D. When Carly (Nichola Burley) and her streetdance crew lose both their leader and their rehearsal space within a short space of time, hope arrives in the unlikely guise of a local ballet school. The school's headmistress, Hel

contents.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber Of Fleet Street
contents.mediumSynopsis: Tim Burton's film version of the Stephen Sondheim musical starring Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter. Based on a 'penny dreadful' tale (which later became an urban myth) from the mid-19th Century, this musical tells the tale of Benjamin Barker (Depp), a barber who re

contents.title: Sweeney!
contents.mediumSynopsis: Flying Squad officers Regan and Carter uncover a conspiracy against the British government. Crime thriller based on the 1970s TV series, starring John Thaw and Dennis Waterman.

contents.title: Taken 2
contents.mediumSynopsis: Two years ago, retired CIA agent Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) used his "particular set of skills" to rescue his daughter, Kim (Maggie Grace), from kidnappers. Since then, Kim has been learning self-defense from her father, and Bryan has been on a personal mission to reunit

contents.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad Of Ricky Bobby
contents.mediumSynopsis: Comedy starring Will Ferrell. NASCAR stock car racing sensation Ricky Bobby (Ferrell) is a national hero because of his 'win at all costs' approach. He and his loyal racing partner, childhood friend Cal Naughton Jr. (John C. Reilly), are a fearless duo known as 'Shake'

contents.title: Tammy And The Bachelor
contents.mediumSynopsis: When pilot Peter Brent (Leslie Nielsen) crashes a small airplane in a swamp near the houseboat of Tambrey "Tammy" Tyree (Debbie Reynolds) in Mississippi, Tammy takes it upon herself to nurse him back to health. While caring for him, she falls in love. To show his gratit

contents.title: Ted
contents.mediumSynopsis: When John Bennett (Mark Wahlberg) was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted (Seth MacFarlane), his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori (Mila Kunis), John's girlfriend.

contents.title: Terminator Salvation
contents.mediumSynopsis: Fourth film in the hugely popular 'Terminator' franchise. The film is set in 2018 in a post-apocalyptic world where the human race is at war with Skynet and its army of deadly Terminators. John Connor (Christian Bale) is a young soldier who is destined to become the lea

contents.title: The Adjustment Bureau
contents.mediumSynopsis: Do we really control our own destiny? This might make you think twice. It's not hard to see why this was such a huge smash with cinema audiences. It's based upon a story by Phillip K. Dick, writer of such tales as Minority Report and Blade Runner.

contents.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
contents.mediumSynopsis: Abandoned by his parents and raised by his aunt and uncle, teenager Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield), AKA Spider-Man, is trying to sort out who he is, and his feelings for his first crush, Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone). When Peter finds a mysterious briefcase that belonged to h

contents.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
contents.mediumSynopsis: Confident in his powers as Spider-Man, Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield) embraces his new role as a hero and spends time with Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone) in between protecting New York from criminals. However, his greatest battle yet is about to begin. With the emergence of El

contents.title: The Avengers
contents.mediumSynopsis: When Thor's evil brother Loki (Tom Hiddleston) gains access to the unlimited power of the Cosmic Cube, Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson), director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., initiates a superhero recruitment effort to defeat this unprece

contents.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
contents.mediumSynopsis: A group of British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to "outsource" their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel, and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they

contents.title: The Book Thief
contents.mediumSynopsis: In 1938, young orphan Liesel (Sophie NÃ©lisse) arrives at the home of her new foster parents, Hans (Geoffrey Rush) and Rosa (Emily Watson). When Hans, a kindly housepainter, learns that Liesel cannot read, he teaches the child the wonders of the written language. Liesel

contents.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
contents.mediumSynopsis: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still

contents.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
contents.mediumSynopsis: The story continues as exiled heir to the throne, Prince Caspian (Ben Barnes), tries to defeat evil King Miraz (Sergio Castellitto) and regain his rightful place on the throne. Thinking it has only been one year since they last visited the magical kingdom of Narnia, the

contents.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
contents.mediumSynopsis: The journey of the Pevensie children continues in the third film adapted from C.S. Lewis's fantasy novel series. The narrative focuses on Lucy (Georgie Henley) and Edmund (Skandar Keynes), joined by their cousin, Eustace Clarence Scrubb (Will Poulter), on their new adve

contents.title: The Conjuring
contents.mediumSynopsis: In 1970, paranormal investigators and demonologists Lorraine (Vera Farmiga) and Ed (Patrick Wilson) Warren are summoned to the home of Carolyn (Lili Taylor) and Roger (Ron Livingston) Perron. The Perrons and their five daughters have recently moved into a secluded farmh

contents.title: The Croods
contents.mediumSynopsis: Prehistoric family the Croods live in a particularly dangerous moment in time. Patriarch Grug (Nicolas Cage), his mate, Ugga (Catherine Keener), teenage daughter Eep (Emma Stone), son Thunk (Clark Duke) and feisty Gran (Cloris Leachman) gather food by day and huddle tog

contents.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
contents.mediumSynopsis: Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett star in this fantasy drama based on a 1922 short story by F. Scott Fitzgerald. The film tells the story of Benjamin Button (Pitt), a man born in unusual circumstances: he is born an old man and ages backwards before finally reaching babyhood

contents.title: The Dark Knight
contents.mediumSynopsis: Director Christopher Nolan's sequel to his own 'Batman Begins' sees Gotham's avenging angel squaring-up to a new kid on the block - psychotic prankster, the Joker (Heath Ledger, in the role that won him a posthumous Oscar for Best Supporting Actor). In the space of a ye

contents.title: The Dark Knight Rises
contents.mediumSynopsis: It has been eight years since Batman (Christian Bale), in collusion with Commissioner Gordon (Gary Oldman), vanished into the night. Assuming responsibility for the death of Harvey Dent, Batman sacrificed everything for what he and Gordon hoped would be the greater good

contents.title: The Day The Earth Stood Still
